about-title-second: I am Frontend Developer based in Denmark
about-text: I am educated in Computer Science and Project Management. I really enjoy HTML and CSS and I have experience as a markup developer. I completed the HackYourFuture full-stack coding bootcamp in Aarhus and working as a Frontend Developer Intern at NordInsight.
university: Kyiv National University of Civil Engineering and Architecture
university-first-specoalization: Coding bootcamp designed to cover all aspects of full-stack development including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, MySQL and ReactJS.
university-second-specoalization: Faculty of Automation and Information Technology. Project Management Department. Master degree.
university-third-specoalization: Faculty of Automation and Information Technology. Bachelor degree.
experience-info-first: Working on frontend and full stack tasks, developing new features and pages. Adjusting existing functionality to new data model.
experience-info-second: HTML/CSS coding using OpenCart and WordPress templates. I was responsible for changing styles and layouts for OpenCart or WordPress themes following the design developed in Photoshop or Figma.
